meanings.definition: Not officially agreed upon or accepted.
meanings.sent1: The unapproved plan caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent2: The teacher found the unapproved drawing on the classroom wall.
meanings.sent3: The unapproved party invitation led to unexpected guests.
meanings.sent4: Her unapproved outfit at the formal event raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The unapproved changes to the document were immediately noticed.

meanings.sent1: He was caught using unapproved software on his work computer.
meanings.sent2: The unapproved parking in the restricted area resulted in a fine.
meanings.sent3: Eating the unapproved snacks before dinner was a risky move.
meanings.sent4: Her unapproved absence from the meeting was noted by the supervisor.
meanings.sent5: The unapproved access to the confidential files was a serious breach of protocol.
